alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 14 at 8:11PM MDT until April 15 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Occasional snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
